trans-unit.resname: The flat is located in a residential area and is not suitable for parties, etc. It is very quiet, so we would ask you to respect the peace and quiet and not to make any noise after 10pm. This accommodation includes steps or staircases. Smoking accommodation.
trans-unit.source: The flat is located in a residential area and is not suitable for parties, etc. It is very quiet, so we would ask you to respect the peace and quiet and not to make any noise after 10pm. This accommodation includes steps or staircases. Smoking accommodation.
trans-unit.target: L'appartement est situé dans un quartier résidentiel et n'est pas adapté aux fêtes, etc. Il est très calme, nous vous demandons donc de respecter la tranquillité et de ne faire aucun bruit après 22 heures. Cet hébergement comprend des escaliers. Hébergement fumeur.

trans-unit.resname: Our VILLAS BLUE agency will take care of all the administrative aspects of letting your property on a seasonal basis: drafting contracts, managing the schedule, monitoring payments and reminders (from the deposit to the security deposit). Enjoy the freedom of renting without constraints and benefit from our experience and expertise!
trans-unit.source: Our VILLAS BLUE agency will take care of all the administrative aspects of letting your property on a seasonal basis: drafting contracts, managing the schedule, monitoring payments and reminders (from the deposit to the security deposit). Enjoy the freedom of renting without constraints and benefit from our experience and expertise!
trans-unit.target: Notre agence VILLAS BLUE prendra en charge tous les aspects administratifs de la location de votre propriété saisonnière : rédaction de contrats, gestion du calendrier, suivi des paiements et rappels (du dépôt de garantie à la caution). Profitez de la liberté de louer sans contraintes et bénéficiez de notre expérience et expertise !
Je propose mon bien à la location

trans-unit.resname: Fill in the form and we'll get back to you as soon as possible...

Vous avez besoin de plus d'informations?

trans-unit.resname: Find a place to stay, discover our activities and services, or suggest your own accommodation! Our team is on hand 7 days a week to help you by phone, e-mail or chat. We're here to answer all your questions 24 hours a day.
trans-unit.source: Find a place to stay, discover our activities and services, or suggest your own accommodation! Our team is on hand 7 days a week to help you by phone, e-mail or chat. We're here to answer all your questions 24 hours a day.
trans-unit.target: Trouvez un lieu de séjour, découvrez nos activités et services, ou proposez votre propre hébergement ! Notre équipe est disponible 7 jours sur 7 pour vous aider par téléphone, e-mail ou chat. Nous sommes là pour répondre à toutes vos questions 24 heures sur 24.

trans-unit.resname: Our team lives on site, so they know your future destination and the experiences to be had there inside out. Take advantage of their expertise and create a trip tailored to your desires with them.
trans-unit.source: Our team lives on site, so they know your future destination and the experiences to be had there inside out. Take advantage of their expertise and create a trip tailored to your desires with them.
trans-unit.target: Notre équipe vit sur place, elle connaît donc votre future destination et les expériences à vivre sur le bout des doigts. Profitez de leur expertise et créez un voyage sur mesure selon vos envies avec eux.

trans-unit.resname: Indulge yourself with unique and unforgettable activities selected and tested by our team.
trans-unit.source: Indulge yourself with unique and unforgettable activities selected and tested by our team.
trans-unit.target: Faites-vous plaisir avec des activités uniques et inoubliables sélectionnées et testées par notre équipe.

trans-unit.resname: Throughout the year, they are on hand to ensure you have the best possible stay. They're the ones who make sure your vacation runs smoothly, so you can rely on them to personalize your stay just the way you want it. An in-home chef for a candlelit dinner in your rental? Breakfast delivered to the foot of your bed? A yoga class on your terrace? Personalize your stay and book activities tested by us:
trans-unit.source: Throughout the year, they are on hand to ensure you have the best possible stay. They're the ones who make sure your vacation runs smoothly, so you can rely on them to personalize your stay just the way you want it. An in-home chef for a candlelit dinner in your rental? Breakfast delivered to the foot of your bed? A yoga class on your terrace? Personalize your stay and book activities tested by us:
trans-unit.target: Tout au long de l'année, ils sont là pour s'assurer que vous passiez le meilleur séjour possible. Ce sont eux qui veillent à ce que vos vacances se déroulent sans accroc, donc vous pouvez compter sur eux pour personnaliser votre séjour exactement comme vous le souhaitez. Un chef à domicile pour un dîner aux chandelles dans votre location ? Le petit déjeuner livré au pied de votre lit ? Un cours de yoga sur votre terrasse ? Personnalisez votre séjour et réservez des activités testées par nous :

trans-unit.resname: With LES VILLAS BLUE, renting your home has never been easier. Set your own terms and conditions, leave the management to our team and we'll advertise your property simultaneously with our partners: Google Voyage, Airbnb, Booking, Abritel, Tripadvisor... at no extra cost.
trans-unit.source: With LES VILLAS BLUE, renting your home has never been easier. Set your own terms and conditions, leave the management to our team and we'll advertise your property simultaneously with our partners: Google Voyage, Airbnb, Booking, Abritel, Tripadvisor... at no extra cost.
trans-unit.target: Avec LES VILLAS BLUE, louer votre maison n'a jamais été aussi facile. Définissez vos propres modalités, laissez la gestion à notre équipe et nous annoncerons votre propriété simultanément avec nos partenaires : Google Voyage, Airbnb, Booking, Abritel, Tripadvisor... sans frais supplémentaires.

trans-unit.resname: With a team of concierge travel and hospitality experts, we visit, check and evaluate your accommodation before accepting it for management and launching its worldwide distribution.
trans-unit.source: With a team of concierge travel and hospitality experts, we visit, check and evaluate your accommodation before accepting it for management and launching its worldwide distribution.
trans-unit.target: Avec une équipe d'experts en voyage et en hospitalité, nous visitons, vérifions et évaluons votre logement avant de l'accepter pour la gestion et de le lancer dans sa distribution mondiale.

trans-unit.resname: Keep up to date with Villas Blue news and must-haves !
trans-unit.source: Keep up to date with Villas Blue news and must-haves !
trans-unit.target: Restez informé des actualités et des incontournables de Villas Blue !

trans-unit.resname:
GET ONLINE: In 1 click, your accommodation on LESVILLASBLUE.COM!

Discover all our services tailored to your needs and find the ideal formula with LES VILLAS BLUE. Receive an inspection and evaluation visit of your accommodation from one of our concierges, experts in travel, real estate and hospitality. Detail your conditions and set your rates together so that they can approve your listing in our catalog!
trans-unit.source:
GET ONLINE: In 1 click, your accommodation on LESVILLASBLUE.COM!

Discover all our services tailored to your needs and find the ideal formula with LES VILLAS BLUE. Receive an inspection and evaluation visit of your accommodation from one of our concierges, experts in travel, real estate and hospitality. Detail your conditions and set your rates together so that they can approve your listing in our catalog!
trans-unit.target:
GET ONLINE : En 1 clic, votre logement sur LESVILLASBLUE.COM !

Discover all our services tailored to your needs and find the ideal formula with LES VILLAS BLUE. Receive an inspection and evaluation visit of your accommodation from one of our concierges, experts in travel, real estate and hospitality. Detail your conditions and set your rates together so that they can approve your listing in our catalog!

trans-unit.resname: Entrust the management and marketing of your property to our team! Increase your revenues by 40 percent and your rates by 26 percent with our premium photo service from photographers specialized in real estate and online tourism. We manage everything, including exclusive simultaneous broadcasting on our Partners' websites: Google Voyage, Airbnb, Booking, Abritel, Tripadvisor... at no extra cost.Benefit from the hotel-quality know-how of our concierges who live on site, welcome your travelers on arrival, supervise their stay and maintain your accommodation (cleaning, laundry...).
trans-unit.source: Entrust the management and marketing of your property to our team! Increase your revenues by 40 percent and your rates by 26 percent with our premium photo service from photographers specialized in real estate and online tourism. We manage everything, including exclusive simultaneous broadcasting on our Partners' websites: Google Voyage, Airbnb, Booking, Abritel, Tripadvisor... at no extra cost.Benefit from the hotel-quality know-how of our concierges who live on site, welcome your travelers on arrival, supervise their stay and maintain your accommodation (cleaning, laundry...).
trans-unit.target: Confiez la gestion et la commercialisation de votre bien à notre équipe ! Augmentez vos revenus de 40 pourcent et vos tarifs de 26 pourcent avec notre service photo premium de photographes spécialisés dans l'immobilier et le tourisme en ligne. Nous gérons tout, y compris la diffusion exclusive et simultanée sur les sites de nos Partenaires : Google Voyage, Airbnb, Booking, Abritel, Tripadvisor... sans coût supplémentaire.Bénéficiez du savoir-faire hôtelier de nos concierges qui vivent sur place, accueillent vos voyageurs à leur arrivée, encadrent leur séjour et entretiennent votre logement (ménage, blanchisserie...).

trans-unit.resname: We communicate each rental period transparently, so you can consult your calendar to stay at home whenever you want, and stay informed of rental activity every week. Simply collect your rents and manage your rental accounting with complete peace of mind
trans-unit.source: We communicate each rental period transparently, so you can consult your calendar to stay at home whenever you want, and stay informed of rental activity every week. Simply collect your rents and manage your rental accounting with complete peace of mind
trans-unit.target: Nous communiquons chaque période de location de manière transparente, afin que vous puissiez consulter votre calendrier pour rester chez vous quand vous le souhaitez, et rester informé de l'activité locative chaque semaine. Il vous suffit d'encaisser vos loyers et de gérer votre comptabilité locative en toute sérénité

trans-unit.resname: Take advantage of our exclusive partnership with Airbnb, Abritel, Booking, Google, etc.!
trans-unit.source: Take advantage of our exclusive partnership with Airbnb, Abritel, Booking, Google, etc.!
trans-unit.target: Profitez de nos partenariats exclusifs avec Airbnb, Abritel, Booking, Google, etc.

trans-unit.resname: Welcome your travellers, cleaning, linen, work, assistance, concierge service.
trans-unit.source: Welcome your travellers, cleaning, linen, work, assistance, concierge service.
trans-unit.target: Accueil de vos voyageurs, nettoyage, linge, travaux, assistance, conciergerie.
